entry.title: On consensus changes in bitcoin 2024
entry.summary: The email received indicates a significant level of stress and frustration experienced by the sender. Despite efforts to maintain respectful communication, there is a clear expression of disbelief and astonishment regarding the recipient's perspective or actions, which are perceived as lacking in intelligence. The emotional tone of the message conveys concern for the recipient's well-being, acknowledging the apparent stress they are under. However, the content of the email suggests a breakdown in understanding or agreement on a matter that is not explicitly detailed in the provided context.
